## SchemaClass type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SchemaClass<T> = {
    new (...args: SchemaConstructorParams<T>): SchemaConstructorReturn<T>;
    parse: <T>(this: SchemaParseContext<T>, data: unknown) => T;
    safeParse: <T>(this: SchemaParseContext<T>, data: unknown) => SafeResult<T>;
};
```
